# Input and Output Options

**API Collection**

Input and output options specifically intended for `NSXMLDocument` objects.

## Overview

Because `NSXMLDocument` is a subclass of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode], you can also use the relevant input and output options described in Constants in the `NSXMLNode` class reference. You can specify input options in the `NSXMLDocument` methods [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/init(contentsOf:options:)], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/init(data:options:)], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/init(xmlString:options:)]. The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/xmlData(options:)] method takes output options.

## Constants

- **documentTidyHTML**: Formats HTML into valid XHTML during processing of the document.
- **documentTidyXML**: Changes malformed XML into valid XML during processing of the document.
- **documentValidate**: Validates this document against its DTD (internal or external) or XML Schema.
- **documentXInclude**: Replaces all XInclude nodes in the document with the nodes referred to.
- **documentIncludeContentTypeDeclaration**: Includes a content type declaration for HTML or XHTML in the output of the document.

## Constants

- **XMLDocument.ContentKind**: Type used to define the kind of document content.
- **Document Content Types**: Define document types.
